mapper.update: update RC_SERVICE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_CACHE = #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR}, TIME_OUT = #{timeout,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, APP_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, APP_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where DEL_FLG = '0' order by NAME ASC
select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, APP_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, name SERVICE_NAME,TYPE SERVICE_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, TYPE,DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, APP_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where DEL_FLG = '0' and TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, APP_ID, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, STATUS, IS_CACHE, TIME_OUT from RC_SERVICE where DEL_FLG = '0' AND STATUS = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
